concept.title: Views and indexes
concept.shortdesc: Views and indexes support querying data in Couchbase Server.

conbody.p: Querying of Couchbase data is accomplished via the following:

ul.li: MapReduce views accessed via the View API, which remains unchanged from previous versions of Couchbase Server
Spatial views accessed via the Spatial View API
N1QL queries with global secondary indexes (GSI) and MapReduce views
